sentences.en: Bulk Molding Compound is specifically formulated for injection molding of automotive headlamp reflector applications.
sentences.cn: 玻璃纤维增强团状模塑料,是为汽车车灯设计的特殊配方.

sentences.en: Correct defective components that could hinder proper headlamp alignment.
sentences.cn: 修正故障组件会干扰头灯正确校正.

sentences.en: I saw myself wandering the same foggy hills, surrounded by the ghosts of those before me — but outfitted, of course, with warm clothes, food, water, headlamp and sleeping bag.
sentences.cn: 我仿佛看见我自己迷迷糊糊地在一座相同的雾山周围绕圈子，四周全是在我之前来的人们的鬼魂—但是我有充足的准备，当然，有暖烘烘的衣服，食物，照明灯和睡袋。

sentences.en: Install bolts to hold fascia to headlamp mounting panel at each side of grille.
sentences.cn: 将固定面板在风栅两侧头灯固定板的螺栓安装好.

sentences.en: Install the headlamp and mounting bucket.
It mainly included: light source modeling, freeform reflector design and headlamp illuminating effect simulation.
sentences.cn: 其主要内容包括光源建模 、 自由曲面反射器的设计和前照灯照明效果模拟三大部分.

sentences.en: Light - vehicle headlamp reflector is constituted of parabolas to 3 - D surface, which is a deep drawing workpiece.
sentences.cn: 轻型车前照灯反光镜是由抛物曲线构成的 三维 曲面深拉深件.

sentences.en: Remove the headlamp switch from the instrument panel.
sentences.cn: 请从仪表板上拆下头灯开关.

sentences.en: The flat tall and slender head lamp headlamp is glowering likely.
sentences.cn: 扁平细长的大灯像在怒目而视.

sentences.en: They are the same with the derivative connect wires for headlamp, home appliance, aviation, electrical fixture, etc.
sentences.cn: 适用于特殊家用电器 、 照明灯具 、 电子设备内外引出连接线.

sentences.en: They are the same with the inner fixed wires for headlamp, home appliance, electrical machine, etc.
sentences.cn: 硅胶多芯电缆适用于各种灯饰 、 家用电器 、 电子机电等内部固定连接线.

sentences.en: They are the same with the inner fixed wires headlamp home appliance, and electrical machine. etc.
sentences.cn: 适用于各种灯饰、家用电器 、 电子机电的内部固定连接线.

sentences.en: While holding the release button depressed , pull the knob and shaft out of the headlamp switch.
sentences.cn: 保持钮的按住状态, 将按钮和轴拉出开关.

sentences.en: WHILE READING THE LOW BEAM SENSE STATUS, TURN THE HEADLAMP SWITCH OFF THEN BACK ON.
sentences.cn: 当读近光感知状态时, 将头灯开关转为关,然后恢复为开.

sentences.en: Yesterday, I had to change a headlamp bulb on my car.
sentences.cn: 昨天, 我不得不更换了我的车灯灯泡.
